column1: Irfan starts off with a short ball angling away outside off, rears up at the batsman, Shafiq jumps off his ground and fends this chest-high delivery to the right of the cordon
french-cut away for four. Good length and seams back in, takes the inside edge and streaks away fine on the leg side past the leg stump
Iran runs in hard and sends down a short ball outside off, jabbed into the covers
not as short as the previous ball outside off, drags a pull to the right of mid-on
short and outside off, Shehzad rises with the ball and works it away through square leg for a double
full and attacking the front pad of the batsman, nudged away square on the leg side again, this time just a single

and Shehzad welcomes him with a pulled six. Just short of a good length and outside off, Shehzad picks it up and dumps the ball over midwicket. Clears the short boundary. This strike suggests it's a belter
back of a length, picked off through midwicket
back of a length and outside off, kicks at Shafiq, he can't get on top of the ball. A jabbing punch to cover ensues
back of a length and outside off,  punched firmly, but can't beat Dwayne Smith diving across to his right from backward point
short of a length and angled into the right-hander, bunted to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Shehzad has a skittish waft at the ball and inside-edges it beside his feet. An over of short of a length or back of a length ball ends
short of a length and angling away outside off, the short ball seems to be the trend today. Shafiq nearly swings himself off his feet. Beaten lavishly
beaten lavishly again. Short and angling away outside off, this time Shafiq eyes up a cut, not a pull, and does not make contact
dug in short and thuds into the splice of the bat as Shafiq leaps off his feet and awkwardly fends it to the leg side
length ball angling away outside off, Shehzad hits through the line and punchily drives it between point and cover
fuller than the previous ball, dabbed with soft hands to point now
full and outside off, Shehzad leans into the drive and stylishly strokes the ball through extra cover. Away she whistles to the boundary
very full and angling away outside off, drives, but not off the middle, to mid-off. Shafiq finds some breathing space at the other end
good length and angling away outside off, played back down the pitch
pitched up and outside off, Shehzad does not need any second invitations to drive. Leans forward and hits the ball to mid-off
Shafiq shows his ace early. Runs down the track, the left-arm seamer is wary of it, dragging his length back. Shafiq swishes the ball to mid-off. That looked ungainly too
picked off the hips to long leg. Shehzad flowing at the other end
beats mid-off diving across to his right. Will that get Shafiq going? Length ball outside off, he drills it down the ground for his first boundary

Sami, who was greeted by Shehzad with a mighty six, has a bit of revenge. He lets out an animated roar. Shehzad can't believe it. Dug in short on off, this is more a short-arm flap than a short-arm pull. Drags a catch to mid-on

pinned 'em in front. Two wickets in two balls for Sami. An inswinging yorker first up, pings the front boot in line with off stump, too quick for KP. It would have carried onto hit the leg stump. The umpire raises his finger and sends KP on his way. Second successive duck for KP
full and outside off, sliced away from the body past point
full and outside off, driven back down the pitch
very full and tails in, near yorker, dug out
clipped away to deep square for one
back of a length on off, Shafiq clears his front leg and hoicks it across the line over midwicket
bouncer outside off, uses his height to pose a threat to Shafiq. He ignores it, ducking out of the way
back of a length and angled in on off, hangs back and flicks it away square through the leg side
full-toss outside off, instead of bashing that out of the ground, Shafiq mis-times it to cover
short of a good length and outside off, Shafiq sits back and pulls to the right of midwicket. Watson throws himself to his right and makes a good save
back of a length and on a fifth-stump line, Rossouw stands tall and punches into the covers
legbreak outside off, driven to sweeper cover
short and spins, clipped away on the back foot towards deep square leg
full and sliding into the leg stump, goes low and sweeps a single to long leg
quick fizzer from Shadab, defended to the off side
tossed up on the leg stump, inside-edged fine on the leg side
stretches outside off for the sweep. Drags the ball with a hard sweep to deep square leg
full and outside off, uses his feet and drills a drive past mid-off
off-stump yorker, whipped away to deep midwicket
short and outside off, drags a pull through square leg
keeps it short on off, Shafiq has nailed this pull for a change. Swivels on the back foot, assured footwork, and pulls it to the right of the leg umpire. Pinged off the middle of the bat
yorker on off or just a shade outside off, squirted to cover
yorker outside off, Rossouw swishes and misses outside off
tossed-up legbreak outside off, driven on the front foot past mid-off's left
tossed up on the leg stump, Rossouw hacks at it and the ball rolls to deep square off the inside half
drags a sweep from outside off through backward square leg
Haddin fluffs a stumping chance. Rossouw uses his feet and runs past a slider. Haddin does not stay low enough and he can't collect the ball cleanly
dropped short and outside off, square-cut away
quick dart on off, chopped away by Shafiq now through point
Shafiq backs away outside leg, meets a short ball, and punches to long-off
back of a length and outside off, carved away to deep point
full-toss on off, which is slapped down to long-off
wide yorker outside off, Watson makes Rossouw reach out for the ball. The batsman can't touch it. Smart bowling

swiped straight down the throat of long-on. Haddin reprieved him on 5. Rossouw adds only two more runs before holing out to Raees. Haddin will be relieved. Short of a length and outside off, miscued to long-on
full on off, punched to long-on
legbreak outside off, beats the batsman outside off with turn and bounce. Haddin gloves the ball cleanly and swipes the bails off but Sarfraz's back foot went nowhere
tossed outside off, brings out the sweep and hits to deep square
shorter legbreak outside off, chopped to short third man
tapped into the covers for one
floated outside off, swept to deep square leg
starts on off and turns away, guided off the bat-face to short third man
short and outside off from around the wicket, chopped away to cover
shorter and wider outside off, cracked away to sweeper cover on the back foot
arrowed through outside off, non-turning ball, flayed to wide long-off
dangled up on off stump, Sarfraz goes low, unleashes his favourite slog-sweep, and sends the white ball into the stands beyond midwicket
short and wide outside off, backs away and slashes it for one
Shafiq dashes down the track, meets a half-volley and drills it fiercely down the ground, forcing Sarfraz to duck for cover. 13 runs off the over

short of a length on middle, glances the hip and rolls on the pitch. He chances a quick single, Rumman swoops in and attacks the ball, but can't break the stumps. Sarfraz would have been out had Rumman hit

Rumman has his man now. Sarfraz uses his feet, Rumman drags his length back. This gets big on Sarfraz. He attempts a hook. Has to settle with a top edge. Haddin tracks down the skier. Well done, Isalamabad
full on off, pushed to cover
shuffles across off and works a full ball towards square leg
very full on the pads, flicked away calmly to fine leg
Shafiq slinks away outside leg stump, slower ball outside off, flat-batted away to point
full and angled in on off, nudged into the vacant spaces at midwicket
dropped short and outside off, cut to deep point
skids on outside off, Mahmudullah aims a reverse-sweep, loses his balance and falls over. But his back leg was grounded by the time Haddin broke the stumps
slower legbreak, length ball, turns away, the batsman hangs back and knocks it to the leg side
a bit too full to attempt the sweep. Dragged away square on the leg side
a ripper to finish a ripping spell. Starts around off and spins away outside off, whistling past the groping bat. He ends with figures of 4-0-19-0. A boundary-less four-over spell!
yorker on off, the batsman, having backed away, jams the ball fine of deep third man
back of a length and outside off, throws his bat at the ball. An inside-edge streaks away to long leg

The top edge sails over the head of Haddin. Sails over the boundary. Irfan bends his back and sends down a short ball outside off. Mahmudullah stepped out, attempted a hook, and watched the top-edge fly away for a six
full-toss just outside off, carved towards third man
jumps off his ground and glides a short ball from outside off to a diving short third man
full-toss on off, stabbed past Irfan's left to mid-off
Shafiq falls first ball after the break. He falls for a Jekyll-and-Hyde 45. Shortish and outside off, he looks to swing across the line. Loses his shape and misses. Watson hits the top of off
back of a length and outside off, cudgeled to deep cover
full on off, patted to the leg side on the back foot
full and outside off, right up in Thisara's hitting arc. Opens up his shoulders and launches it straight over the bowler's head
wide yorker, Thisara can only carve it away to short third man
full and outside off, smeared to cover, where the fielder fumbles
yorker outside off, Thisara backs away outside leg, jams his bat down and edges it past Haddin's left
speared full and outside off, slashed to cover
off-stump yorker on off, jammed down the ground
wide yoker outside off, swipes and does not make contact
marginally misses the yorker. A really full ball outside off, carved to deep point
nails a yorker, dug back to the bowler
full-toss outside off, eyes a big leg-side slog, skews the ball up over cover
Mahmudullah jumps down the track, wide full-toss outside off, left alone
slower short ball outside off, shoulder-high delivery,  attempts a hook and is beaten by the lack of pace
yorker on leg stump, whipped to deep square leg
slower ball, drilled down the ground
slower one again, from the back of the hand, Mahmudullah manufactures his own pace. Length ball outside off, smeared over the bowler's head for a six
punched over the bowler's head for one
very full and outside off, opens the face and slices a drive to backward point
full and outside off, hammered straight over the bowler's head. The bowler was ducking for cover or rather taking evasive action
full-toss outside off, slapped away to deep cover
change-up slower ball outside off, driven down to long-off
146ks, off-side wide
yorker, swings in, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball dribbles back to Sami
full-toss outside off, Mahmudullah sizes it up and slams it straight of long-on. Muscled it away with authority
low full-toss outside off, carved away over point for four
banged in short and outside off, Thisara lets it pass over him. He questioningly looks at the umpire anticipating a wide for height. It wasn't to be
very full and outside off, kerplunked into the leg side off the inside half
slower short ball, swiped off the inside half to square leg
full on the legs, full-blooded flick to fine leg

low full-toss on off, Thisara can only push it back to Rumman. He stops the ball with his right boot, scoops the ball into his hands, then spins back, aims at the stumps and adroitly under-arms it at the non-striker's end to catch Thisara short
full and swinging down the leg side, Smith lets it go. Leg-side wide
full and outside off, Smith drums it away to point. Can't find the gap
back of a length and slanted in, Smith plays back and is rapped on the thigh. But this is heading past leg stump
full on the stumps, knocked into the leg side
full inswinger, catches Billings on the move. He plays around the front pad and does not connect
Billings shimmies out and bunts a length ball to mid-on
bumper on the leg stump, flies off the deck, flies over the ducking batsman to the keeper. Wide called for height
just short of a good length on off, punched in the direction of midwicket
overpitched and outside off, Billings holds his shape, opens the face and threads the gap at cover with a sweet drive
pretty full and angled in on off, Billings flicks it away through the vacant spaces at midwicket
back of a length and slanted in on off, a whirl of the wrists as Billings hits towards midwicket
full and angled in on off, pushed to mid-on running in
length ball on off, negotiated a straight bat
Smith backs away outside leg, the bowler chases him, whipped to deep square leg
short and outside off, leans back and chops to cover-point
uses his feet, meets a full ball and pushes to mid-on
full inswinger, inside-edged onto the pad
lifter on off, ducks under it
full and outside off, driven to mid-off for a quick single
slower delivery on off, forward and patted to point
full and outside off, swish and a miss
back of a length and angled in on off, jabbed to mid-on
slower incutter, dabbed with soft hands to the leg side
back of a length and angled in, hangs back and punches to midwicket
slower full ball on off stump, Smith looks to launch it out of Sharjah. He can only miscue it to deep midwicket
just short of a good length and outside off, forced to long-on
Billings gallops down the track, the bowler had dragged his length back, but Billings still flat-batted it away past mid-off
Billings goes over cover down. Steps out again, takes a short ball and muscles it over the top for back-to-back fours

short and angled into the body, Billings aims to fend. The ball lobs to the leg side. Smith is too eager for the single. Billings isn't interested. Sends his partner back. The bowler hunts the ball down, Smith whips around, but Anwar attempts the throw, hitting Smith on the back. It was unintentional and thus the appeal for obstructing the field is shot down by umpire Dar
full on the legs, flicked away handsomely square of short fine leg for four. Billings in fine touch
another leg-side flick, this time for one
full and outside off, pushed to long-off
slides in with the arm, paddled away fine of short fine leg for four
Nawaz strikes with his third ball. Slides in with the arm. Non-turning ball, which is not short enough for the short-arm pull. Smith does not connect. Nawaz barges into his castle and takes him down
skids on outside off, not short enough for the cut. Haddin misjudges it and gets away
uses his feet, does not meet the pitch, and wears it on the pad
again, Haddin uses his feet, he is nowhere close to the pitch. Deflects the ball off the thigh to the leg side
chopped from off stump to short third man with an angled bat
short and spins away outside off, catches the outside edge and streaks away fine of short third man. Good save
slides in with the arm, the length is fuller, push-driven to long-on
full on the stumps, eased down to long-on
down the track and whips a full ball from off stump to deep midwicket
Haddin steps out, but is not close enough to the pitch. Poked back to the bowler
starts on off and spins away, dabbed to point with soft hands
Billings goes inside-out, beating long-off to his left. Twinkles down the track, collapses his back leg at the last instant and times it to perfection
down the track and clipped to wide long-on
tossed full on off, Haddin clears his front leg and hoists it over the bowler's head

Haddin nicks behind. Double-strike from Nawaz. Shortish and skids on outside off, Haddin backs away outside leg and only under-edges it behind to Sarfraz. The shot was probably on, the execution was iffy
too full on middle, reverse-paddled from the stumps to short third man
full and speared into the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
attacks the stumps, Misbah hangs back and nudges the ball through square leg
Billings skips out, but is beaten by turn. The outside edge dies in front of short third
Misbah goes low, sweeps from leg stump, but can't get it past short fine leg
Misbah steps away outside leg, Hasan follows him and raps him on the pad
skids into the pads, picked off to deep square leg for one
not short enough for a cut outside off. Billings slashes and does not make contact
length ball on off, allows the ball to come onto him, and runs it down to third man. Smoothly done
back of a length and outside off, Misbah jabs it away in the direction of short third man
Misbah goes downtown. He races down the track, takes a full ball, and clouts it over the bowler's head. Clean, clean strike. Sir Viv is ecstatic in the Quetta change room
shortish and outside off, punched away.... but backward point ventures to his left and hunts it down
bouncer outside off, Misbah jumps down the track, does not connect with a hook. The ball beats the keeper too. Byes
pushed through on the stumps, driven to long-on
nicely tossed on the off stump, Misbah goes low and sweeps it away to the right of deep square leg. Top placement
Misbah moves away outside leg, the bowler follows him. Darted in, jabbed back
Hasan sends Misbah back. Slides in with the arm, too full for the sweep. Misbah stretches across, but can't connect and is pinned in front of off and middle
full and hurtles in on leg stump, played back to Hasan
quicker and flatter outside off, played back to the bowler
flat and arrowed in on off, worked away to wide mid-on
darted outside off, straight ball, beats Watson's punch
slides in on middle, punched back to the bowler now
fired outside off, Watson plays and misses
pushed through and angled in on middle, defended back to the bowler
very full for the sweep, Watson still goes for the shot and may have managed a bottom edge
down the track and drilled back to the bowler
shortish and angled in on off, hangs back and forces to long-on
floaty full ball outside off, Billings races down the track and stylishly launches it straight over the bowler's head
skids in flat, worked away to the leg side on the back foot
pushed through outside off, back of a length, punched to long-off
fired on off, punched back to the bowler
short on off, jabbed away square towards point
off-stump yorker, which is whipped to midwicket
full and just outside off, cracked away to the long-off fence
dug short and outside off, Watson pivots on the back foot and pulls over square leg. One-bounce four
length ball angled in, dragged away to deep midwicket
lifting short ball outside off, beats Billings' attempt to hook
Watson hits the roof. Bang. Slower length ball outside off, Watson picked it and dispatched it over midwicket. Bounces into the roof. What a way to bring up the hundred
full and angling away outside off from around the wicket, slapped away to long-off
slower awaycutter outside off, Billings opens the bat-face, dinks it to point, and acknowledges his fifty
fuller and outside off, drops to one-knee and slices it away to deep cover
pretty full on the leg stump, Billings drops to one knee and shovel-sweeps the ball over long leg, despite the bottom hand flying off the bat, for a six
overpitched and outside off, whiplashed away to wide long-off
uses his feet and drives to long-on
length ball outside off, punched into the covers
skids on off, played back to the bowler
turned away to midwicket
skids on outside off, leans back and punches to point
flat and slides on with the arm, pushed back to the bowler
slower ball outside off, Billings reaches out, swishes early and misses
another slower short ball outside off, Billings throws his bat at the ball and mis-times it back to the bowler
chest-high short ball on off, Billings is unperturbed. He rides the bounce and pulls superbly over long leg for a six
full on the stumps, whittled into the leg side
another slower one on a fourth-stump line outside off. Watson swipes early to leg and does not make contact
full on the stumps, hacked to square leg off the inside half
back of the hand slower ball on off stump, slog-swept across the line to deep midwicket
low full-toss on off, Watson stretches forward and crunches this in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
Watson beats long-off to his left now. This is overpitched outside off, Watson hits the half-volley on the up
Perera comes around the wicket. It does not matter at all. He smites it over the bowler's head. Watson goes 4,4,6

4,4,6, and out! Holes out to deep midwicket. Can't clear the long boundary. Chest-high short ball on middle and leg stump, tucks Watson up for room. He does not get hold of the pull. Smart catch by Hasan at the edge of the boundary
pitched up and outside off, Billings drive to cover and fetches the strike

yorker on the leg stump, whipped away to deep midwicket. Billings hares across for the second. The keeper collects the throw and hits the stumps, but Billings was in. The throw from the deep wasn't great
just short of a good length and angled in, tucked off the hips through square leg
pretty full and on off stump, Billings sits deep in the crease and whiplashes it away to the long-on fence. That's some shot
slower short ball on the leg stump, he swivels on the back foot and controls a pull to long leg
short ball, angled in at the ribs, Asif can't control the pull. He skies a top edge, which is gulped down by KP at long leg. Islamabad four away from victory
Billings finishes it for Islamabad. Poor ball - full-toss outside off - Billings uses his wrists and shovels it away to the right of deep midwicket
